artifact_ssr_001.name: Colossus Arm
artifact_ssr_001.description: Not happy with your own arms? Try this one! A powerful arm with a polished finish and a flashy design. Your best bet in just about every situation.
artifact_ssr_001.source: Summon a colossus arm to fight for you for the next 20 seconds. Cooldown: **300** seconds. Gain hitstun immunity for the next 20 seconds. Tap the Relic again to cancel. Normal attacks deal damage equal to **0%** of ATK and **strongly launch** enemies. Skills deal damage equal to **1%** of ATK and **strongly suspend** enemies. Cooldown: **10** seconds.

artifact_ssr_002.name: Omnium Shield
artifact_ssr_002.description: Do you want to be the lead character of a movie? Do you want to stop any incoming bullets by simply raising your hand? Try out the Omnium Shield, which has a powerful barrier and stops incoming projectiles.
artifact_ssr_002.source: Generate an Omnium shield that stops projectiles for **10** seconds, with starting energy equal to **200%** of the Wanderer's Max HP and a **90**-second cooldown.

artifact_ssr_004.name: Type V Armor
artifact_ssr_004.description: Worried about losing battles and tucking your tail? Do your feet constantly weigh you down? Then, try this transformation on for size. Anytime, anywhere, deploy and pilot the Type V-II Droid. For an entire minute, experience what it's like to chase the wind in this new era of technology!
artifact_ssr_004.source:
Pilot mechanized armor to fight for **30** seconds. Cooldown: **200** seconds. Immune to hitstun. Tap again to exit and detonate the armor. Skill: **Aimed Shot**.
**Aimed Shot**: Shoot rapidly to deal damage equal to **44.4%** of ATK per hit.

artifact_ssr_005.name: Spacetime Rift
artifact_ssr_005.description: Envious of others' ability to stop time? Trigger dimensional collapses with Spacetime Rift and become the master of time, drawing in nearby targets.
artifact_ssr_005.source: Launch a proton bomb at the target location, creating a rift in time-space that draws in targets for **10** seconds. After 1.5 seconds, the center of the rift deals damage equal to **0%** of ATK to targets caught in the area every **0.5** seconds. Cooldown: **100** seconds.

artifact_ssr_008.name: Drone
artifact_ssr_008.description: Are you fighting alone? Summon support drones to help you battle, so you can fight with confidence.
artifact_ssr_008.source: Summon a Drone for **15** seconds, increasing final damage reduction by **5%** every **5** seconds. Cooldown: **120** seconds.

artifact_ssr_010.name: Hologram Projector
artifact_ssr_010.description: Project a hologram that synchronously replays the Wanderer's attacks.
artifact_ssr_010.source: Summon a missile launcher for **8** seconds. **90**-second cooldown. Fire multiple missiles to attack nearby enemies, each dealing damage equal to **30%** of ATK.

artifact_ssr_011.name: Alternate Destiny
artifact_ssr_011.description: A mysterious organization is said to have invented this device to prevent the death of the user. Some claim the device came from the tale of golden fruit and a satyr archer, while others believe it was created specifically to deal with the explosion of Omnium Towers.
artifact_ssr_011.source: Generate a Pocket Dimension for **8** seconds. Allied Wanderers gain immunity to hitstun effects in the dimension, and HP will not drop below **20%** from enemy attacks. Cooldown: **90** seconds. Leaving the dimension removes all buffs. Once you have spent **8** seconds in the dimension, you cannot be buffed by it for **45** seconds.

artifact_ssr_012.name: Type II Couant
artifact_ssr_012.description: As a result of the new Relic developed by Couant, Executors no longer need to be put in dangerous situations.
artifact_ssr_012.source: Summon a Type II Couant and generate a shield for **5** seconds, which disappears after 5 seconds or after being struck once. Upon disappearing, the shield knocks back nearby enemies and deals damage equal to **100%** of Attack +**50**. After the shield is broken, increase damage by **20%** for **10** seconds. For every **1** second the generated shield exists on the battlefield, gain 1 additional stack of blessing once the shield ends (is broken). Each blessing stack will reduce damage by **2%** for ** 10** seconds. Stack up to **5** times. Cooldown: **30** seconds (shares cooldown with other Couants).

artifact_ssr_013.name: Hoverboard
artifact_ssr_013.description: Roam the endless wilderness with this under your feet.

artifact_ssr_014.name: Heaven's Dice
artifact_ssr_014.source:
Roll all the dice, and different quantities of dice you cast have different effects. Every time you roll a dice in battle, you will randomly gain **1** out of **10** buffs which is cleared after the battle. The buffs include: Frost damage +**10%**, flame damage +**10%**, volt damage +**10%**, physical damage +**10%**, altered damage +**10%**, frost damage received −**5%**, flame damage received −**5%**, volt damage received −**5%**, physical damage received −**5%**, and altered damage received −**5%**. Only **1** random buff can be gained when casting dice, and all effects are only stacked **1 time**. At 5 stars, rolling 3 Heaven's Dice will grant all the elemental damage boosts. A new dice are gained every **30** seconds, and up to **3** dice can be accumulated. When**Couant** or **Type II Couant** is deployed, no dice rolling would be allowed: 
When **1** dice is cast, immediately get **180** weapon charge. If the number rolled is **1** or **6**, get the **Thermonuclear** effect: Gain **20%** damage boost for **35** seconds.
When **2** dice are cast, immediately get **180** weapon charge and the **Thermonuclear** effect. If the **2** dice have the same number of points, get the **Fusion** effect: Clear the cooldown of all weapon skills.
When **3** dice are cast, immediately get **180** weapon charge, the **Thermonuclear** effect, and the **Fusion** effect. If the **3** dice have the same number of points, get the **Overclock** effect: Using discharge skills within **6** seconds doesn't cost weapon charge.
When the Relic Heaven's Dice is removed, clear the random buffs and Thermonuclear effect added by the Heaven's Dice.

artifact_ssr_016.name: Overdrive Shot
artifact_ssr_016.source:
When used, mark the current weapon and grant it **3** doses that last for **200** seconds. Also gain the **Micro Attack** effect: Increase damage dealt by **4%** for **200** seconds. Using a marked weapon's skill consumes **1** dose each time and grants **Overdrive**: Increase damage dealt by **15%** for **20** seconds. Overdrive is removed when switching to other weapons. Overdrive Shot has a **240**-second cooldown.
When removing Overdrive Shot or switching Relics, the remaining doses, the Micro Attack, and Overdrive effects will all be removed. When a weapon is marked a second time, the doses from the first mark are removed.

artifact_ssr_018.name: Thalassic Heart
artifact_ssr_018.description: Legend has it that a mythical siren heart hidden within a thorny conch shell is capable of calling a storm upon the waves. Honoring this myth, the Ocean Development Group chose to name one of their important instruments after the heart. Though it cannot command storms, it can control water flow to augment the tide. Its complete model is even capable of transforming into a dolphin.
artifact_ssr_018.source: Generate a Thalassic Heart at the target's location. Cooldown: **60** seconds. Every **2** seconds, the Thalassic Heart will deal damage to nearby targets equal to **2%** (**0.2%** in Apex League) of the Wanderer's Max HP for **45** seconds. The type of elemental damage dealt will be that of the current weapon. Damage received by targets hit is also increased by **4%** for **5** seconds.

artifact_ssr_019.name: Speedwalkers
artifact_ssr_019.source: Speedwalkers can be used to enter the zephyr state, allowing you to move freely on the wall and jump to quickly cover a short distance for **15** seconds. Cooldown: **90** seconds. Speedwalkers are only usable in Domain 9.

artifact_ssr_020.name: Bubble Gun
artifact_ssr_020.description: They said that a short blond creator in Mirroria made this on a whim...
artifact_ssr_020.source: Tap the fire button to consume **1** drop of bubble solution and fire a few bubbles that deal damage equal to **10%** of ATK each. Hold for **0.5** seconds to consume **5** drops of bubble solution and fire a big bubble that deals damage equal to **300%** of ATK. The big bubble is capable of engulfing most small targets and causing them to fly away. Each target can only be engulfed and flown **1** time every **15** seconds, and targets with hyperbody are not affected. Big bubbles have a **5**-second cooldown. The bubble solution is refilled at a rate of **1** drop every **3** seconds, and **10** drops are refilled after defeating an enemy. Bubble Gun can hold up to **30** drops of bubble solution.

artifact_ssr_021.name: Triple Mask
artifact_ssr_021.description: Originally developed to assist patients with facial injuries, it ended up accumulating a great deal of versatile functions beyond its ornamental value. While a mask is typically used to hide the wearer, the technology within one can also unveil new aspects of the world.
artifact_ssr_021.source: Use to put on Triple Mask's Mask of the Void. While exploring the Overworld, you will not be attacked by enemies other than bosses. When discovered by certain enemies, detection will be triggered. While wearing Mask of the Void, enemies under the influence of the mask will not alert other enemies when attacked. Use Triple Mask again to remove the current mask and enter cooldown. Cooldown: **20** seconds.

artifact_sr_001.name: Hovering Cannon
artifact_sr_001.description: While attacking, the Hovering Cannon generates additional attacks that deal damage to the same enemies. Your damage will never be too low again.
artifact_sr_001.source: Summon a Hovering Cannon for **20** seconds with the skill: Laser Beam, which deals **5.6%** ATK damage to the target each time. Cooldown: **240** seconds.

artifact_sr_004.name: Jetpack
artifact_sr_004.description: A great device to have for roaming around.

artifact_sr_005.name: Lava Bomb
artifact_sr_005.description: The fire shall incinerate everything and light up their path. Equip Lava Bomb to toss bombs and ignite flammable objects in the target area.
artifact_sr_005.source: Toss a Lava Bomb at a target, dealing damage equal to **0%** of ATK and **strongly launching** the target. Cooldown: **45** seconds.

artifact_sr_005_B_WXM.name: Lava Bomb
artifact_sr_005_B_WXM.description: The fire shall incinerate everything and light up their path. Equip Lava Bomb to toss bombs and ignite flammable objects in the target area.
artifact_sr_005_B_WXM.source: Toss a Lava Bomb at a target, dealing damage equal to **0%** of ATK and **strongly launching** the target. Cooldown: **45** seconds.

artifact_sr_006.name: Jetboard
artifact_sr_006.description: Roam the endless wilderness with this under your feet.

artifact_sr_007.name: Magnetic Storm
artifact_sr_007.description: Contain a powerful device that transmits the magnetic field nearby, producing an electric tornado that throws enemies into the air.

artifact_sr_009.name: Quantum Cloak
artifact_sr_009.description: With this, you no longer need your robe and wizard hat. Become the hero in your own magical world when you put on this cloak, which makes your body intangible, taking no damage.
artifact_sr_009.source: Enter a quantum state for **10** seconds, during which enemies cannot detect the wearer. The wearer exits quantum state after attacking once. Cooldown: **120** seconds.

artifact_sr_010.name: Missile Barrage
artifact_sr_010.description: Equipped with homing system, the missiles deal damage from all directions so your enemies have nowhere to run. Fight with your best partner by your side!
artifact_sr_010.source: Summon a missile launcher for **8** seconds. **90**-second cooldown. Fire multiple missiles to attack nearby enemies, each dealing damage equal to **30%** of ATK.

artifact_sr_011.name: Cybernetic Arm
artifact_sr_011.description: Fire a Cybernetic Arm to pull the target in.
artifact_sr_011.source: Fire a Cybernetic Arm to pull the selected target to you, or you to the target. Deal **100%** damage on hit, **strongly suspend** the target, and regenerate weapon charge by **300**. Can be used to access hard-to-reach areas, and stores up to **2** charges at a time. Regain **1** charge every **30** seconds.

artifact_sr_012.name: Couant
artifact_sr_012.description: You dare strike me? You'll get what's coming to you!
artifact_sr_012.source: Summon a droid and generate a shield for **5** seconds. The shield disappears after **5** seconds or after being struck once. When it disappears, it knocks back nearby enemies, dealing damage equal to **100%** of ATK plus **50**. If broken within **1** second of being created, the shield will stun enemies for **2** seconds. Cooldown: **30** seconds. Share cooldown with Type II Couant.

artifact_sr_013.name: Strange Cube
artifact_sr_013.description: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic. Levitate the target and launch them into the air.
artifact_sr_013.source: Deal damage equal to **0%** of ATK to nearby targets and cause **5**-second **stun**. Suspend blue Omnium items from Banges Tech for **10** seconds. While suspended, the target recharges when taking attacks. When resumed, the target flies in the opposite direction of the attacks and deals damage equal to **0%** of ATK to any object crashed into. Cooldown: **30** seconds.

artifact_sr_014.name: Omnium Handcannon
artifact_sr_014.description: The compressed cold jet is able to freeze the air.
artifact_sr_014.source: Launch **1** Omnium bomb at target location and create a scalable energy pillar upon striking the ground or water surface for up to **20** seconds. Cooldown: **50** seconds. Can hold up to **2** charges.

artifact_sr_015.name: Magnetic Pulse
artifact_sr_015.description: Greetings. Please maintain appropriate social distance.
artifact_sr_015.source: Detonate a Magnetic Bomb, dealing volt damage equal to **0%** of ATK and **strongly launching** targets. Grant the user immunity to hitstun for **5** seconds. Cooldown: **35** seconds.

artifact_sr_017.name: Canned Spinach
artifact_sr_017.source: After eating a can of empowering vegetables, the Wanderer will be unable to act for **6** seconds except to use Relics, but recover **2%** of Max HP every second. When receiving damage during this time, restore the same value of HP as the damage received. Cooldown: **30** seconds.

artifact_sr_018.name: Flashbang
artifact_sr_018.source: Throw a flashbang forwards, with an AoE affecting allies and enemies alike for **5** seconds. You and allies can avoid its effects by facing away.

artifact_sr_019.name: Canned Spinach
artifact_sr_019.source: After eating a can of empowering vegetables, the Wanderer will be unable to act for **6** seconds except to use Relics, but recover **2%** of Max HP every second. When receiving damage during this time, restore the same value of HP as the damage received. Cooldown: **30** seconds.

wormhole_artifact_sr_001.description: While attacking, the Hovering Cannon generates additional attacks that deal damage to the same enemies. Your damage will never be too low again.
wormhole_artifact_sr_001.source: Summon a Hovering Cannon for **20** seconds with the skill: Laser Beam, which deals **5.6%** ATK damage to the target each time. Cooldown: **240** seconds.
